fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY Parallel Diff New York
fixes.dax_expression: IF('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[BOOK_LOCATION] = "New York", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY Parallel] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign], 0)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF...THEN...ELSE to a DAX IF expression and mapped all field references to the 'TableName'[ColumnName] format. This is a row-level calculation that multiplies the Delta Down All CCY Parallel by Date Sign only for BOOK_LOCATION = "New York"; otherwise returns 0.
